chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
rri: raft_refinement_interface
llli: logs_leaderLogs_interface
rlmli: refined_log_matching_lemmas_interface
ollpti: one_leaderLog_per_term_interface
llsi: leaderLogs_sorted_interface
llsli: leaderLogs_sublog_interface
lsli: leader_sublog_interface
nisi: nextIndex_safety_interface
llci: leaderLogs_contiguous_interface
aelmi: allEntries_log_matching_interface
aertsi: append_entries_request_term_sanity_interface
aelsi: allEntries_leader_sublog_interface

Goal:
forall (l1 l2 : list entry) (i : logIndex), prefix_within_term l1 l2 -> prefix_within_term (findGtIndex l1 i) l2

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
prefix_within_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (l1 l2 : list entry) => forall e e' : entry, eTerm e = eTerm e' -> eIndex e <= eIndex e' -> In e l1 -> In e' l2 -> In e l2 : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> list entry -> Prop Arguments prefix_within_term {orig_base_params raft_params} (_ _)%list_scope
logIndex = nat : Set
findGtIndex = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fix findGtIndex (entries : list entry) (i : logIndex) {struct entries} : list entry := match entries with | [] => [] | e :: es => if i <? eIndex e then e :: findGtIndex es i else [] end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), list entry -> logIndex -> list entry Arguments findGtIndex {orig_base_params raft_params} _%list_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
findGtIndex_app_in_2 : forall (l1 l2 : list entry) (e : entry), sorted (l1 ++ l2) -> In e l2 -> exists l' : list entry, findGtIndex (l1 ++ l2) (eIndex e) = l1 ++ l' /\ Prefix l' l2
fast_OMEGA12 : forall (v2 c2 l1 l2 k2 : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (v2 * (c2 * k2) + (l1 + l2 * k2))%Z -> P (l1 + (v2 * c2 + l2) * k2)%Z
fast_OMEGA15 : forall (v c1 c2 l1 l2 k2 : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (v * (c1 + c2 * k2) + (l1 + l2 * k2))%Z -> P (v * c1 + l1 + (v * c2 + l2) * k2)%Z
findGtIndex_app_in_1 : forall (l1 l2 : list entry) (e : entry), sorted (l1 ++ l2) -> In e l1 -> exists l' : list entry, findGtIndex (l1 ++ l2) (eIndex e) = l' /\ (forall x : entry, In x l' -> In x l1)
fast_OMEGA14 : forall (v l1 l2 : Z) (x : positive) (P : Z -> Prop), P (l1 + l2)%Z -> P (v * Z.neg x + l1 + (v * Z.pos x + l2))%Z
fast_OMEGA13 : forall (v l1 l2 : Z) (x : positive) (P : Z -> Prop), P (l1 + l2)%Z -> P (v * Z.pos x + l1 + (v * Z.neg x + l2))%Z
subseq_findGtIndex : forall (xs : list entry) (i : logIndex), subseq (findGtIndex xs i) xs
findGtIndex_Prefix : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex), Prefix (findGtIndex l i) l
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_commute : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : logIndex), sorted l -> removeAfterIndex (findGtIndex l i) i' = findGtIndex (removeAfterIndex l i') i
fast_OMEGA11 : forall (v1 c1 l1 l2 k1 : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (v1 * (c1 * k1) + (l1 * k1 + l2))%Z -> P ((v1 * c1 + l1) * k1 + l2)%Z
fast_OMEGA10 : forall (v c1 c2 l1 l2 k1 k2 : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (v * (c1 * k1 + c2 * k2) + (l1 * k1 + l2 * k2))%Z -> P ((v * c1 + l1) * k1 + (v * c2 + l2) * k2)%Z
Prefix = fix Prefix (A : Type) (l1 l2 : list A) {struct l1} : Prop := match l1 with | [] => True | a :: l1' => match l2 with | [] => False | b :: l2' => a = b /\ Prefix A l1' l2' end end : forall A : Type, list A -> list A -> Prop Arguments Prefix {A}%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope
findGtIndex_in : forall (xs : list entry) (i : logIndex) (x : entry), In x (findGtIndex xs i) -> In x xs
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_i_lt_i' : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : nat), sorted l -> i < i' -> filter (fun x : entry => (i <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? i')) (findGtIndex l i) ++ removeAfterIndex l i = removeAfterIndex l i'
findGtIndex_removeAfterIndex_i'_le_i : forall (l : list entry) (i i' : nat), sorted l -> i' <= i -> filter (fun x : entry => (i <? eIndex x) && (eIndex x <=? i')) (findGtIndex l i) ++ removeAfterIndex l i = removeAfterIndex l i
findGtIndex_necessary : forall (entries : list entry) (e : entry) (x : logIndex), In e (findGtIndex entries x) -> In e entries /\ eIndex e > x
removeAfterIndex_in : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (a : entry), In a (removeAfterIndex l i) -> In a l
findGtIndex_max : forall (entries : list entry) (x : logIndex), maxIndex (findGtIndex entries x) <= maxIndex entries
allEntries_leaderLogs_prefix_within_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (l : list entry) (h' : Net.name), In (t, l) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h'))) -> prefix_within_term (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) l : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments allEntries_leaderLogs_prefix_within_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
log_leaderLogs_prefix_within_term = fun net : network => forall (h : Net.name) (t : term) (ll : list entry) (leader : Net.name), In (t, ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net leader))) -> prefix_within_term (log (snd (nwState net h))) ll : network -> Prop
findGtIndex_nil : forall (l : list entry) (i : nat), (forall e' : entry, In e' l -> eIndex e' <= i) -> findGtIndex l i = []
removeAfterIndex_eq : forall (l : list entry) (i : nat), (forall e : entry, In e l -> eIndex e <= i) -> removeAfterIndex l i = l
log_log_prefix_within_term = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall h h' : Net.name, prefix_within_term (log (snd (nwState net h))) (log (snd (nwState net h'))) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments log_log_prefix_within_term {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
append_entries_log_prefix_within_term = fun net : network => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (h : Net.name), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> prefix_within_term es (log (snd (nwState net h))) : network -> Prop
Record logs_leaderLogs_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_logs_leaderLogs_interface { logs_leaderLogs_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_leaderLogs net; logs_leaderLogs_nw_invariant : forall net : network, refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> logs_leaderLogs_nw net } Arguments logs_leaderLogs_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_logs_leaderLogs_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} (_ _)%function_scope
allEntries_log_prefix_within_term = fun net : network => forall h h' : Net.name, prefix_within_term (map snd (allEntries (fst (nwState net h)))) (log (snd (nwState net h'))) : network -> Prop
append_entries_leaderLogs_prefix_within_term = fun net : network => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (h : Net.name) (t' : term) (ll : list entry), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> In (t', ll) (leaderLogs (fst (nwState net h))) -> prefix_within_term es ll : network -> Prop
findGtIndex_contiguous : forall (entries : list entry) (x : nat), sorted entries -> (forall i : nat, 0 < i <= maxIndex entries -> exists e : entry, In e entries /\ eIndex e = i) -> forall i : nat, x < i <= maxIndex entries -> exists e : entry, In e (findGtIndex entries x) /\ eIndex e = i
findGtIndex_sufficient : forall (e : entry) (entries : list entry) (x : nat), sorted entries -> In e entries -> eIndex e > x -> In e (findGtIndex entries x)
entries_sorted_nw = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) => forall (p : packet) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), In p (nwPackets net) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> sorted es : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Prop Arguments entries_sorted_nw {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}

```coq
intros l1 l2 i Hprefix.
unfold prefix_within_term.
intros e e' Heq_term Heq_index Hin_l1 Hin_l2.
apply Hprefix with e (findGtIndex l1 i) e'; auto.
- apply findGtIndex_in; auto.
- apply findGtIndex_necessary; auto.
Qed.

original: intros l1 l2 i Hprefix. unfold prefix_within_term. intros e e' Heq_term Heq_index Hin_l1 Hin_l2. apply Hprefix with e (findGtIndex l1 i) e'; auto. - apply findGtIndex_in; auto. - apply findGtIndex_necessary; auto.
